document_data.name: Shou Quarter
document_data.mainbody: The '''Shou Quarter''' was a district of [[Westgate]] that was home to many immigrant [[Shou]].
document_data.Geography: Much of the architecture was of [[Kara-Tur]]an design. The quarter was connected to the rest of Westgate by a bridge over the [[River Thunn]].
